name: The Point of no Return (Treehouse Dreams)
name_original: The Point of no Return (Treehouse Dreams)
description:
The Point of no Return is a walking simulator that tells a deeply personal account of a Ukrainian war veteran from his decision to serve in the war zone to his return home with a physical injury and mental instability. 

The story is told through his communication with his war buddies and his family back home, and through seldom interaction with the environment. 

The project is still in development. We will post updates on a regular basis.

---

The project was realized with the support of Ukrainian Cultural Foundation. The opinions of the Ukrainian Cultural Foundation may not coincide with the idea of the authors.
